Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game

Class PlayerSetup

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.PlayerSetup
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonConvertable
public class PlayerSetup extends Object implements JsonConvertable
Represents the setup configuration for a player, including their starter card, goals, hand of cards, and chosen color.

    • PlayerSetup

      public PlayerSetup(StarterCard starterCard, GoalCard[] goals, ArrayList<PlayableCard> hand, Color color)
      Constructs a new PlayerSetup with the specified starter card, goals, hand, and color.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - the starter card for the player
      goals - an array of goals for the player
      hand - the player's hand of playable cards
      color - the color representing the player

  • Method Details

    • selectGoal

      public boolean selectGoal(GoalCard goalCard)
      Selects a goal card for the player.
      Parameters:
      goalCard - the goal card to be selected
      Returns:
      true if the goal card is successfully selected, false otherwise
